img.title: Coutesy of Totally Sweet Images

ml:description.p: After an extended hiatus, the New York MarkLogic Users Group (NY-MUG) is starting up again at the end of this month! The September 30th meeting is being hosted by our friends at Simon and Schuster in their offices at 1230 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10020, 11th floor. Between 48th and 49th streets on Sixth Avenue.

This incarnation of NY-MUG comes with some changes at the healm. MarkLogic partner, Flatirons Solutions, is taking over as the group's new leaders. And Iain Finlayson, MarkLogic Sales Engineer has stepped up to serve as the group's liaison to MarkLogic.

Please come join us for a presentation from Norm Walsh, MarkLogic Lead Engineer. Norm will show how to build a Web Analytics tool from scratch using Application Builder, Information Studio, and the XSLT support that all come with MarkLogic Server 4.2
If you're coming, please rsvp over at http://meetup.com/ny-mug so we can bring the right amount of food and drinks. Hope to see you there!

ml:details.ml:location: 1230 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10020, 11th floor. Between 48th and 49th streets on Sixth Avenue
ml:details.ml:topic: Building a Web Analytics Tool with MarkLogic Server 4.2
